description: DC operating point golden data for linear circuits

circuits.name: voltage_divider_equal
circuits.description: Equal resistor voltage divider: V(2) = V1/2
circuits.netlist:
Voltage Divider Equal
V1 1 0 DC 10
R1 1 2 1k
R2 2 0 1k
.end

circuits.name: voltage_divider_2to1
circuits.netlist:
Voltage Divider 2to1
V1 1 0 DC 10
R1 1 2 2k
R2 2 0 1k
.end

circuits.name: series_resistors
circuits.description: Three resistors in series with current source
circuits.netlist:
Series Resistors
I1 0 1 DC 1m
R1 1 2 1k
R2 2 3 2k
R3 3 0 3k
.end

circuits.name: parallel_resistors
circuits.netlist:
Parallel Resistors
I1 0 1 DC 10m
R1 1 0 1k
R2 1 0 1k
.end

circuits.name: wheatstone_bridge_balanced
circuits.netlist:
Wheatstone Bridge Balanced

R1 1 2 1k
R2 2 0 1k
R3 1 3 2k
R4 3 0 2k
Rbridge 2 3 10k
.end

circuits.netlist:

.end

circuits.name: superposition_two_sources
circuits.description: Two voltage sources for superposition principle
circuits.netlist:

V2 3 0 DC 4

R2 2 3 1k
R3 2 0 1k
.end
